name: Night Revenge
description:
A woman at home alone at night... A crazy assassin trying to get into her house... This is "Night Revenge", a short survival horror game where you'll have to do everything to prevent the assassin from getting into your house. House.

SYNOPSIS:

Samantha suffers an attempted murder, but manages to hit the killer with a lamp and call the police to arrest him.

20 years later he wins his freedom and will do what he always dreamed of... get revenge!

BE OUR PATRON AND PLAY ALL OUR GAMES FOR FREE!
